params.market: The GMX market address to get benchmark data for

returns.benchmark: The benchmark data including value, token amounts, timestamps, and addresses

getAllAssetsPrices().notice: Returns the prices of all assets supported by the TokenManager It could be used as a helper method for UI

getBalance(bytes32).notice: Returns a current balance of the asset held by the smart loan

getGmxPositionBenchmark(address).notice: Returns the saved GMX position benchmark for a given market
